name: Spillet
description:
This is a simple physics based platformer where you control various shapes that do stuff through two short stages, one a tutorial and the other a short attempt at a multi-path level design.

it's free, short and hopefully fun, so please try it out. 

all criticism is welcome.

Might update it if anyone cares for it.

Have fun.

Credits to my friend for Bluu for making the music.

Bluu's socials https://www.instagram.com/bluu001/
